Example of Preparing Digital Content

To integrate these resources with the digital tool, Fatima designed special research assignments that prompted her students to seek out additional information.

This approach turned the classroom into a dynamic learning environment where students actively contributed to a growing library of cultural knowledge.

Their explorations didn't stop there; they began to share their discoveries in an online blog, transforming it into a vibrant forum where they taught each other about the nuances of Arabic and French cultures.
